mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.kmlbid AS "kmlbid", a.kmnb AS "kmnb", a.kmname AS "kmname", a.zh AS "zh", a.je AS "je", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c_km( id, kmlbid, kmnb, kmname, zh, je, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{kmlbid}, #{kmnb}, #{kmname}, #{zh}, #{je}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE c_km SET kmlbid = #{kmlbid}, kmnb = #{kmnb}, kmname = #{kmname}, zh = #{zh}, je = #{je}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
